thing.title: Brain Gears
thing.author: hoeken
thing.description: A neat 3D printable model designed to show off the capabilities of 3D printers. Not sure if we can print these *just* yet with a MakerBot, but its a good thing to aim for.Watch the video to see it in action:youtube.com/watch?v=h6ozSqo3lfw&feature;=related
